import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Tilt from 'react-vanilla-tilt' import Ethos from './Ethos' import Parallax from 'react-rellax' //IMAGES import hoodieOne from '../images/hoodie1.jpg' import hoodieTwo from '../images/hoodie2.jpg' import teeOne from '../images/tee1.jpg' import teeTwo from '../images/tee2.jpg' const Shop = ({ products, tees }) => { return (

HOODIES & TEES

{/*

CAMO HOODIE

$ 90 USD

PRIDE HOODIE

$ 80 USD

CC TEE

$ 32 USD

KLEPTO TEE

$ 32 USD

*/}
{products.map(product => (

{product.title}

$ {product.price} USD
))} {tees.map(tee => (

{tee.title}

$ {tee.price} USD
))}
) } export default Shop
